author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp Says Qtrly Profit Attributable $47.7 Mln
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp:
* QTRLY REVENUE $787.2 MILLION VERSUS $814.8 MILLION * IN Q1 2018 REVENUE TO INCREASE BY 7% TO 9% QOQ * IN Q1 2018 GROSS MARGIN TO RANGE FROM 25% TO 27% * QTRLY PROFIT FOR PERIOD ATTRIBUTABLE $47.7 MILLION VERSUS $104 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
